description:
Welcome to Escape From The Abandoned hospital escape - a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with Escape From The Abandoned hospital escape - a cool escape game?

Assume that you have a Abandoned Hospital in your locality. As the is abandoned, so nobody is allowed to trespass the Abandoned Hospital. But visiting the abandoned hospital is one of important wishes in your life. So you went to the abandoned Hospital, as the nursing Hospital is very big, you lost your way in the Abandoned Hospital. So use your skills to collect the Hospital items in the Abandoned Hospital to escape from the Abandoned Hospital Escape. Good luck and have fun


Your friends are medical students. You really find them cool. But they are finding it so hard. Some of them wants to give up already. But you're one of the persons telling them to just keep on going. They can't give up now when they have gone far. Your words give them motivation for just a short while. So you're out looking for something that can strengthen their love and commitment for their studies. You're thinking of bringing up the past of the doctors. And by the past, you mean the way doctors perform their work before modern technology. To do that, you have to visit some old hospital. There's an abandoned one on the mountains. During the Japanese occupation, they built that to aid the wounded and sick. After their rule, they left the place but the structure remained. You believe you can get so many information there.

You enter the building easily. No one seems to be taking care of it but the equipment are still there. You look at them one by one. While doing so, you feel someone else is moving in the room. You look around but can't find anyone. You continue on looking until a test tube starts rolling. At the same time the door is also closing. You catch the test tube but the door closed.
